description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Design 2D & 3D layout and floor plan for fitness/ gym, spa & residential facility
              
              -	Able to create good 3D drawings is required.
              
              -	3D walk through is an advantage but not required.
              
              -	Doing design marketing material.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Graduate from relevant university/college
              
              - Proficiency in using Autocad, 3Dmax, Photoshop
              
              - Can work independently or in team
              
              - Long term comittment
              
              - Ability to communicate in English is an advantage but not necessary.
              
              - Experience is an advantage but not required.
              
              - Logical thinking and able to create good 3D perspective
              
              - Open to Male & Female
              
              - Working place: Hanoi
              
              Deadline to apply: 5/8/2018
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Having many opportunities to be trained abroad in USA, Korea and Singapore
               







                Basic benefits including social insurance, annual leaves & sick leaves
